36void SetContextId(Local<Context> context, int id) {
37 auto v8_context = Utils::OpenDirectHandle(*context);
38 DCHECK_NO_SCRIPT_NO_EXCEPTION(v8_context->GetIsolate());
39 v8_context->set_debug_context_id(i::Smi::FromInt(id));
40}
41
42int GetContextId(Local<Context> context) {
43 auto v8_context = Utils::OpenDirectHandle(*context);
44 DCHECK_NO_SCRIPT_NO_EXCEPTION(v8_context->GetIsolate());
45 i::Tagged<i::Object> value = v8_context->debug_context_id();
46 return (IsSmi(value)) ? i::Smi::ToInt(value) : 0;
47}
48
49void SetInspector(Isolate* isolate, v8_inspector::V8Inspector* inspector) {
50 i::Isolate* i_isolate = reinterpret_cast<i::Isolate*>(isolate);
51 DCHECK_NO_SCRIPT_NO_EXCEPTION(i_isolate);
52 if (inspector == nullptr) {
53 i_isolate->set_inspector(nullptr);
54 } else {
55 i_isolate->set_inspector(inspector);
56 }
57}
58
59v8_inspector::V8Inspector* GetInspector(Isolate* isolate) {
60 i::Isolate* i_isolate = reinterpret_cast<i::Isolate*>(isolate);
61 DCHECK_NO_SCRIPT_NO_EXCEPTION(i_isolate);
62 return i_isolate->inspector();
63}

65namespace {
66
67i::Handle<i::String> GetBigIntStringPresentationHandle(
68 i::Isolate* i_isolate, i::Handle<i::BigInt> i_bigint) {
69 // For large BigInts computing the decimal string representation
70 // can take a long time, so we go with hexadecimal in that case.
71 int radix = (i_bigint->Words64Count() > 100 * 1000) ? 16 : 10;
72 i::Handle<i::String> string_value =
73 i::BigInt::ToString(i_isolate, i_bigint, radix, i::kDontThrow)
74 .ToHandleChecked();
75 if (radix == 16) {
76 if (i_bigint->IsNegative()) {
77 string_value =
78 i_isolate->factory()
79 ->NewConsString(
80 i_isolate->factory()->NewStringFromAsciiChecked("-0x"),
81 i_isolate->factory()->NewProperSubString(
82 string_value, 1, string_value->length() - 1))
83 .ToHandleChecked();
84 } else {
85 string_value =
86 i_isolate->factory()
87 ->NewConsString(
88 i_isolate->factory()->NewStringFromAsciiChecked("0x"),
89 string_value)
90 .ToHandleChecked();
91 }
92 }
93 return string_value;
94}
95
96} // namespace
97
98Local<String> GetBigIntStringValue(Isolate* isolate, Local<BigInt> bigint) {
99 i::Isolate* i_isolate = reinterpret_cast<i::Isolate*>(isolate);
100 ENTER_V8_NO_SCRIPT_NO_EXCEPTION(i_isolate);
101 i::Handle<i::BigInt> i_bigint = Utils::OpenHandle(*bigint);
102
103 i::Handle<i::String> string_value =
104 GetBigIntStringPresentationHandle(i_isolate, i_bigint);
105 return Utils::ToLocal(string_value);
106}
107
108Local<String> GetBigIntDescription(Isolate* isolate, Local<BigInt> bigint) {
109 i::Isolate* i_isolate = reinterpret_cast<i::Isolate*>(isolate);
110 ENTER_V8_NO_SCRIPT_NO_EXCEPTION(i_isolate);
111 i::Handle<i::BigInt> i_bigint = Utils::OpenHandle(*bigint);
112
113 i::Handle<i::String> string_value =
114 GetBigIntStringPresentationHandle(i_isolate, i_bigint);
115
116 i::Handle<i::String> description =
117 i_isolate->factory()
118 ->NewConsString(
119 string_value,
120 i_isolate->factory()->LookupSingleCharacterStringFromCode('n'))
121 .ToHandleChecked();
122 return Utils::ToLocal(description);
123}
124
125Local<String> GetDateDescription(Local<Date> date) {
126 auto receiver = Utils::OpenDirectHandle(*date);
127 auto jsdate = i::DirectHandle<i::JSDate>::cast(receiver);
128 i::Isolate* i_isolate = jsdate->GetIsolate();
129 ENTER_V8_NO_SCRIPT_NO_EXCEPTION(i_isolate);
130 auto buffer = i::ToDateString(i::Object::Number(jsdate->value()),
131 i_isolate->date_cache(),
132 i::ToDateStringMode::kLocalDateAndTime);
133 return Utils::ToLocal(i_isolate->factory()
134 ->NewStringFromUtf8(base::VectorOf(buffer))
135 .ToHandleChecked());
136}
137
138Local<String> GetFunctionDescription(Local<Function> function) {
139 auto receiver = Utils::OpenHandle(*function);
140 auto i_isolate = receiver->GetIsolate();
141 ENTER_V8_NO_SCRIPT_NO_EXCEPTION(i_isolate);
142 if (IsJSBoundFunction(*receiver)) {
143 return Utils::ToLocal(i::JSBoundFunction::ToString(
144 i::Handle<i::JSBoundFunction>::cast(receiver)));
145 }
146 if (IsJSFunction(*receiver)) {
147 auto js_function = i::Handle<i::JSFunction>::cast(receiver);
148#if V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
149 if (js_function->shared()->HasWasmExportedFunctionData()) {
150 auto i_isolate = js_function->GetIsolate();
151 auto func_index = js_function->shared()
152 ->wasm_exported_function_data()
153 ->function_index();
154 auto instance = i::handle(
155 js_function->shared()->wasm_exported_function_data()->instance(),
156 i_isolate);
157 if (instance->module()->origin == i::wasm::kWasmOrigin) {
158 // For asm.js functions, we can still print the source
159 // code (hopefully), so don't bother with them here.
160 auto debug_name =
161 i::GetWasmFunctionDebugName(i_isolate, instance, func_index);
162 i::IncrementalStringBuilder builder(i_isolate);
163 builder.AppendCStringLiteral("function ");
164 builder.AppendString(debug_name);
165 builder.AppendCStringLiteral("() { [native code] }");
166 return Utils::ToLocal(builder.Finish().ToHandleChecked(), i_isolate);
167 }
168 }
169#endif // V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
170 return Utils::ToLocal(i::JSFunction::ToString(js_function));
171 }
172 return Utils::ToLocal(
173 receiver->GetIsolate()->factory()->function_native_code_string());
174}
175
176void SetBreakOnNextFunctionCall(Isolate* isolate) {
177 auto i_isolate = reinterpret_cast<i::Isolate*>(isolate);
178 DCHECK_NO_SCRIPT_NO_EXCEPTION(i_isolate);
179 i_isolate->debug()->SetBreakOnNextFunctionCall();
180}
181
182void ClearBreakOnNextFunctionCall(Isolate* isolate) {
183 auto i_isolate = reinterpret_cast<i::Isolate*>(isolate);
184 DCHECK_NO_SCRIPT_NO_EXCEPTION(i_isolate);
185 i_isolate->debug()->ClearBreakOnNextFunctionCall();
186}

188MaybeLocal<Array> GetInternalProperties(Isolate* v8_isolate,
189 Local<Value> value) {
190 i::Isolate* isolate = reinterpret_cast<i::Isolate*>(v8_isolate);
191 ENTER_V8_NO_SCRIPT_NO_EXCEPTION(isolate);
192 i::Handle<i::Object> val = Utils::OpenHandle(*value);
193 i::Handle<i::JSArray> result;
194 if (!i::Runtime::GetInternalProperties(isolate, val).ToHandle(&result))
195 return MaybeLocal<Array>();
196 return Utils::ToLocal(result);
197}
198
199namespace {
200
201using FlagFilter = std::function<bool(i::IsStaticFlag)>;
202using VariableModeFilter = std::function<bool(i::VariableMode)>;
203using ContextLocalIterator = std::function<void(
204 i::VariableMode, i::Handle<i::String>, i::Handle<i::Object>)>;
205
206void ForEachContextLocal(i::Isolate* isolate, i::Handle<i::Context> context,
207 const VariableModeFilter& var_mode_filter,
208 const FlagFilter& flag_filter,
209 const ContextLocalIterator& context_local_it) {
210 DCHECK_NO_SCRIPT_NO_EXCEPTION(isolate);
211 i::Handle<i::ScopeInfo> scope_info(context->scope_info(), isolate);
212 for (auto it : i::ScopeInfo::IterateLocalNames(scope_info)) {
213 i::Handle<i::String> name(it->name(), isolate);
214 i::VariableMode mode = scope_info->ContextLocalMode(it->index());
215 if (!var_mode_filter(mode)) {
216 continue;
217 }
218 i::IsStaticFlag flag = scope_info->ContextLocalIsStaticFlag(it->index());
219 if (!flag_filter(flag)) {
220 continue;
221 }
222 int context_index = scope_info->ContextHeaderLength() + it->index();
223 i::Handle<i::Object> slot_value(context->get(context_index), isolate);
224 context_local_it(mode, name, slot_value);
225 }
226}
227
228} // namespace
229
230bool GetPrivateMembers(Local<Context> context, Local<Object> object, int filter,
231 LocalVector<Value>* names_out,
232 LocalVector<Value>* values_out) {
233 i::Isolate* isolate = reinterpret_cast<i::Isolate*>(context->GetIsolate());
234 API_RCS_SCOPE(isolate, debug, GetPrivateMembers);
235 ENTER_V8_NO_SCRIPT_NO_EXCEPTION(isolate);
236
237 bool include_methods =
238 filter & static_cast<int>(PrivateMemberFilter::kPrivateMethods);
239 bool include_fields =
240 filter & static_cast<int>(PrivateMemberFilter::kPrivateFields);
241 bool include_accessors =
242 filter & static_cast<int>(PrivateMemberFilter::kPrivateAccessors);
243 bool include_methods_or_accessors = include_methods || include_accessors;
244
245 auto var_mode_filter =
246 include_methods
247 ? (include_accessors ? i::IsPrivateMethodOrAccessorVariableMode
248 : i::IsPrivateMethodVariableMode)
249 : i::IsPrivateAccessorVariableMode;
250 auto constexpr instance_filter = [](i::IsStaticFlag flag) {
251 return flag == i::IsStaticFlag::kNotStatic;
252 };
253 auto constexpr static_filter = [](i::IsStaticFlag flag) {
254 return flag == i::IsStaticFlag::kStatic;
255 };
256
257 i::Handle<i::JSReceiver> receiver = Utils::OpenHandle(*object);
258
259 i::PropertyFilter key_filter =
260 static_cast<i::PropertyFilter>(i::PropertyFilter::PRIVATE_NAMES_ONLY);
261 i::Handle<i::FixedArray> keys;
262 ASSIGN_RETURN_ON_EXCEPTION_VALUE(
263 isolate, keys,
264 i::KeyAccumulator::GetKeys(isolate, receiver,
265 i::KeyCollectionMode::kOwnOnly, key_filter,
266 i::GetKeysConversion::kConvertToString),
267 false);
268
269 // Estimate number of private fields and private instance methods/accessors.
270 int private_entries_count = 0;
271 auto count_private_entry = [&](i::VariableMode mode, i::Handle<i::String>,
272 i::Handle<i::Object>) {
273 private_entries_count++;
274 };
275 for (int i = 0; i < keys->length(); ++i) {
276 // Exclude the private brand symbols.
277 i::Handle<i::Symbol> key(i::Symbol::cast(keys->get(i)), isolate);
278 if (key->is_private_brand()) {
279 if (include_methods_or_accessors) {
280 i::Handle<i::Object> value;
281 ASSIGN_RETURN_ON_EXCEPTION_VALUE(
282 isolate, value, i::Object::GetProperty(isolate, receiver, key),
283 false);
284
285 i::Handle<i::Context> value_context(i::Context::cast(*value), isolate);
286 ForEachContextLocal(isolate, value_context, var_mode_filter,
287 instance_filter, count_private_entry);
288 }
289 } else if (include_fields) {
290 private_entries_count++;
291 }
292 }
293
294 // Estimate number of static private methods/accessors for classes.
295 bool has_static_private_methods_or_accessors = false;
296 if (include_methods_or_accessors) {
297 if (IsJSFunction(*receiver)) {
298 i::DirectHandle<i::JSFunction> func(i::JSFunction::cast(*receiver),
299 isolate);
300 i::DirectHandle<i::SharedFunctionInfo> shared(func->shared(), isolate);
301 if (shared->is_class_constructor() &&
302 shared->has_static_private_methods_or_accessors()) {
303 has_static_private_methods_or_accessors = true;
304 i::Handle<i::Context> func_context(func->context(), isolate);
305 ForEachContextLocal(isolate, func_context, var_mode_filter,
306 static_filter, count_private_entry);
307 }
308 }
309 }
310
311 DCHECK(names_out->empty());
312 names_out->reserve(private_entries_count);
313 DCHECK(values_out->empty());
314 values_out->reserve(private_entries_count);
315
316 auto add_private_entry = [&](i::VariableMode mode, i::Handle<i::String> name,
317 i::Handle<i::Object> value) {
318 DCHECK_IMPLIES(mode == i::VariableMode::kPrivateMethod,
319 IsJSFunction(*value));
320 DCHECK_IMPLIES(mode != i::VariableMode::kPrivateMethod,
321 IsAccessorPair(*value));
322 names_out->push_back(Utils::ToLocal(name));
323 values_out->push_back(Utils::ToLocal(value));
324 };
325 if (has_static_private_methods_or_accessors) {
326 i::Handle<i::Context> receiver_context(
327 i::JSFunction::cast(*receiver)->context(), isolate);
328 ForEachContextLocal(isolate, receiver_context, var_mode_filter,
329 static_filter, add_private_entry);
330 }
331
332 for (int i = 0; i < keys->length(); ++i) {
333 i::DirectHandle<i::Object> obj_key(keys->get(i), isolate);
334 i::Handle<i::Symbol> key(i::Symbol::cast(*obj_key), isolate);
335 CHECK(key->is_private_name());
336 i::Handle<i::Object> value;
337 ASSIGN_RETURN_ON_EXCEPTION_VALUE(
338 isolate, value, i::Object::GetProperty(isolate, receiver, key), false);
339 if (key->is_private_brand()) {
340 if (include_methods_or_accessors) {
341 DCHECK(IsContext(*value));
342 i::Handle<i::Context> value_context(i::Context::cast(*value), isolate);
343 ForEachContextLocal(isolate, value_context, var_mode_filter,
344 instance_filter, add_private_entry);
345 }
346 } else if (include_fields) { // Private fields
347 i::DirectHandle<i::String> name(
348 i::String::cast(i::Symbol::cast(*key)->description()), isolate);
349 names_out->push_back(Utils::ToLocal(name, isolate));
350 values_out->push_back(Utils::ToLocal(value, isolate));
351 }
352 }
353
354 DCHECK_EQ(names_out->size(), values_out->size());
355 DCHECK_LE(names_out->size(), private_entries_count);
356 return true;
357}
358
359MaybeLocal<Context> GetCreationContext(Local<Object> value) {
360 if (IsJSGlobalProxy(*Utils::OpenDirectHandle(*value))) {
361 return MaybeLocal<Context>();
362 }
363 return value->GetCreationContext();
364}
365
366void ChangeBreakOnException(Isolate* isolate, ExceptionBreakState type) {
367 i::Isolate* i_isolate = reinterpret_cast<i::Isolate*>(isolate);
368 DCHECK_NO_SCRIPT_NO_EXCEPTION(i_isolate);
369 i_isolate->debug()->ChangeBreakOnException(
370 i::BreakCaughtException,
371 type == BreakOnCaughtException || type == BreakOnAnyException);
372 i_isolate->debug()->ChangeBreakOnException(
373 i::BreakUncaughtException,
374 type == BreakOnUncaughtException || type == BreakOnAnyException);
375}
376
377void SetBreakPointsActive(Isolate* v8_isolate, bool is_active) {
378 i::Isolate* isolate = reinterpret_cast<i::Isolate*>(v8_isolate);
379 ENTER_V8_NO_SCRIPT_NO_EXCEPTION(isolate);
380 isolate->debug()->set_break_points_active(is_active);
381}
382
383void PrepareStep(Isolate* v8_isolate, StepAction action) {
384 i::Isolate* isolate = reinterpret_cast<i::Isolate*>(v8_isolate);
385 ENTER_V8_BASIC(isolate);
386 CHECK(isolate->debug()->CheckExecutionState());
387 // Clear all current stepping setup.
388 isolate->debug()->ClearStepping();
389 // Prepare step.
390 isolate->debug()->PrepareStep(static_cast<i::StepAction>(action));
391}
392
393bool PrepareRestartFrame(Isolate* v8_isolate, int callFrameOrdinal) {
394 i::Isolate* isolate = reinterpret_cast<i::Isolate*>(v8_isolate);
395 ENTER_V8_BASIC(isolate);
396 CHECK(isolate->debug()->CheckExecutionState());
397
398 i::DebugStackTraceIterator it(isolate, callFrameOrdinal);
399 if (it.Done() || !it.CanBeRestarted()) return false;
400
401 // Clear all current stepping setup.
402 isolate->debug()->ClearStepping();
403 it.PrepareRestart();
404 return true;
405}
406
407void ClearStepping(Isolate* v8_isolate) {
408 i::Isolate* isolate = reinterpret_cast<i::Isolate*>(v8_isolate);
409 ENTER_V8_NO_SCRIPT_NO_EXCEPTION(isolate);
410 // Clear all current stepping setup.
411 isolate->debug()->ClearStepping();
412}
413
414void BreakRightNow(Isolate* v8_isolate,
415 base::EnumSet<debug::BreakReason> break_reasons) {
416 i::Isolate* isolate = reinterpret_cast<i::Isolate*>(v8_isolate);
417 ENTER_V8_BASIC(isolate);
418 isolate->debug()->HandleDebugBreak(i::kIgnoreIfAllFramesBlackboxed,
419 break_reasons);
420}
421
422void SetTerminateOnResume(Isolate* v8_isolate) {
423 i::Isolate* isolate = reinterpret_cast<i::Isolate*>(v8_isolate);
424 ENTER_V8_NO_SCRIPT_NO_EXCEPTION(isolate);
425 isolate->debug()->SetTerminateOnResume();
426}
427
428bool CanBreakProgram(Isolate* v8_isolate) {
429 i::Isolate* isolate = reinterpret_cast<i::Isolate*>(v8_isolate);
430 ENTER_V8_BASIC(isolate);
431 return !isolate->debug()->AllFramesOnStackAreBlackboxed();
432}
433
434size_t ScriptSource::Length() const {
435 auto source = Utils::OpenDirectHandle(this);
436 if (IsString(*source)) {
437 return i::DirectHandle<i::String>::cast(source)->length();
438 }
439 return Size();
440}
441
442size_t ScriptSource::Size() const {
443#if V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
444 MemorySpan<const uint8_t> wasm_bytecode;
445 if (WasmBytecode().To(&wasm_bytecode)) {
446 return wasm_bytecode.size();
447 }
448#endif // V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
449 auto source = Utils::OpenDirectHandle(this);
450 if (!IsString(*source)) return 0;
451 auto string = i::DirectHandle<i::String>::cast(source);
452 return string->length() * (string->IsTwoByteRepresentation() ? 2 : 1);
453}
454
455MaybeLocal<String> ScriptSource::JavaScriptCode() const {
456 i::Handle<i::HeapObject> source = Utils::OpenHandle(this);
457 if (!IsString(*source)) return MaybeLocal<String>();
458 return Utils::ToLocal(i::Handle<i::String>::cast(source));
459}
460
461#if V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
462Maybe<MemorySpan<const uint8_t>> ScriptSource::WasmBytecode() const {
463 auto source = Utils::OpenDirectHandle(this);
464 if (!IsForeign(*source)) return Nothing<MemorySpan<const uint8_t>>();
465 base::Vector<const uint8_t> wire_bytes =
466 i::Managed<i::wasm::NativeModule>::cast(*source)->raw()->wire_bytes();
467 return Just(MemorySpan<const uint8_t>{wire_bytes.begin(), wire_bytes.size()});
468}
469#endif // V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
470
471Isolate* Script::GetIsolate() const {
472 return reinterpret_cast<Isolate*>(
473 Utils::OpenDirectHandle(this)->GetIsolate());
474}
475
476ScriptOriginOptions Script::OriginOptions() const {
477 return Utils::OpenDirectHandle(this)->origin_options();
478}
479
480bool Script::WasCompiled() const {
481 return Utils::OpenDirectHandle(this)->compilation_state() ==
482 i::Script::CompilationState::kCompiled;
483}
484
485bool Script::IsEmbedded() const {
486 auto script = Utils::OpenDirectHandle(this);
487 return script->context_data() ==
488 script->GetReadOnlyRoots().uninitialized_symbol();
489}
490
491int Script::Id() const { return Utils::OpenDirectHandle(this)->id(); }
492
493int Script::StartLine() const {
494 return Utils::OpenDirectHandle(this)->line_offset();
495}
496
497int Script::StartColumn() const {
498 return Utils::OpenDirectHandle(this)->column_offset();
499}
500
501int Script::EndLine() const {
502 i::Handle<i::Script> script = Utils::OpenHandle(this);
503#if V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
504 if (script->type() == i::Script::Type::kWasm) return 0;
505#endif // V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
506 if (!IsString(script->source())) {
507 return script->line_offset();
508 }
509 i::Isolate* isolate = script->GetIsolate();
510 i::HandleScope scope(isolate);
511 i::Script::PositionInfo info;
512 i::Script::GetPositionInfo(
513 script, i::String::cast(script->source())->length(), &info);
514 return info.line;
515}
516
517int Script::EndColumn() const {
518 i::Handle<i::Script> script = Utils::OpenHandle(this);
519#if V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
520 if (script->type() == i::Script::Type::kWasm) {
521 return script->wasm_native_module()->wire_bytes().length();
522 }
523#endif // V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
524 if (!IsString(script->source())) {
525 return script->column_offset();
526 }
527 i::Isolate* isolate = script->GetIsolate();
528 i::HandleScope scope(isolate);
529 i::Script::PositionInfo info;
530 i::Script::GetPositionInfo(
531 script, i::String::cast(script->source())->length(), &info);
532 return info.column;
533}
534
535MaybeLocal<String> Script::Name() const {
536 auto script = Utils::OpenDirectHandle(this);
537 i::Isolate* isolate = script->GetIsolate();
538 i::DirectHandle<i::Object> value(script->name(), isolate);
539 if (!IsString(*value)) return MaybeLocal<String>();
540 return Utils::ToLocal(i::DirectHandle<i::String>::cast(value), isolate);
541}
542
543MaybeLocal<String> Script::SourceURL() const {
544 auto script = Utils::OpenDirectHandle(this);
545 i::Isolate* isolate = script->GetIsolate();
546 i::DirectHandle<i::PrimitiveHeapObject> value(script->source_url(), isolate);
547 if (!IsString(*value)) return MaybeLocal<String>();
548 return Utils::ToLocal(i::DirectHandle<i::String>::cast(value), isolate);
549}
550
551MaybeLocal<String> Script::SourceMappingURL() const {
552 auto script = Utils::OpenDirectHandle(this);
553 i::Isolate* isolate = script->GetIsolate();
554 i::DirectHandle<i::Object> value(script->source_mapping_url(), isolate);
555 if (!IsString(*value)) return MaybeLocal<String>();
556 return Utils::ToLocal(i::DirectHandle<i::String>::cast(value), isolate);
557}
558
559MaybeLocal<String> Script::GetSha256Hash() const {
560 i::Handle<i::Script> script = Utils::OpenHandle(this);
561 i::Isolate* isolate = script->GetIsolate();
562 i::Handle<i::String> value =
563 i::Script::GetScriptHash(isolate, script, /* forceForInspector: */ true);
564 return Utils::ToLocal(value);
565}
566
567Maybe<int> Script::ContextId() const {
568 auto script = Utils::OpenDirectHandle(this);
569 i::Tagged<i::Object> value = script->context_data();
570 if (IsSmi(value)) return Just(i::Smi::ToInt(value));
571 return Nothing<int>();
572}
573
574Local<ScriptSource> Script::Source() const {
575 auto script = Utils::OpenDirectHandle(this);
576 i::Isolate* isolate = script->GetIsolate();
577#if V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
578 if (script->type() == i::Script::Type::kWasm) {
579 i::DirectHandle<i::Object> wasm_native_module(
580 script->wasm_managed_native_module(), isolate);
581 return Utils::Convert<i::Object, ScriptSource>(wasm_native_module, isolate);
582 }
583#endif // V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
584 i::DirectHandle<i::PrimitiveHeapObject> source(script->source(), isolate);
585 return Utils::Convert<i::PrimitiveHeapObject, ScriptSource>(source, isolate);
586}
587
588#if V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
589bool Script::IsWasm() const {
590 return Utils::OpenDirectHandle(this)->type() == i::Script::Type::kWasm;
591}
592#endif // V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
593
594bool Script::IsModule() const {
595 return Utils::OpenDirectHandle(this)->origin_options().IsModule();
596}

598namespace {
599
600int GetSmiValue(i::Handle<i::FixedArray> array, int index) {
601 return i::Smi::ToInt(array->get(index));
602}
603
604bool CompareBreakLocation(const i::BreakLocation& loc1,
605 const i::BreakLocation& loc2) {
606 return loc1.position() < loc2.position();
607}
608
609} // namespace
610
611bool Script::GetPossibleBreakpoints(
612 const Location& start, const Location& end, bool restrict_to_function,
613 std::vector<BreakLocation>* locations) const {
614 CHECK(!start.IsEmpty());
615 i::Handle<i::Script> script = Utils::OpenHandle(this);
616#if V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
617 if (script->type() == i::Script::Type::kWasm) {
618 i::wasm::NativeModule* native_module = script->wasm_native_module();
619 return i::WasmScript::GetPossibleBreakpoints(native_module, start, end,
620 locations);
621 }
622#endif // V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
623
624 i::Isolate* isolate = script->GetIsolate();
625
626 int start_offset, end_offset;
627 if (!GetSourceOffset(start, GetSourceOffsetMode::kClamp).To(&start_offset)) {
628 return false;
629 }
630 if (end.IsEmpty()) {
631 end_offset = std::numeric_limits<int>::max();
632 } else if (!GetSourceOffset(end, GetSourceOffsetMode::kClamp)
633 .To(&end_offset)) {
634 return false;
635 }
636 if (start_offset >= end_offset) return true;
637
638 std::vector<i::BreakLocation> v8_locations;
639 if (!isolate->debug()->GetPossibleBreakpoints(
640 script, start_offset, end_offset, restrict_to_function,
641 &v8_locations)) {
642 return false;
643 }
644
645 std::sort(v8_locations.begin(), v8_locations.end(), CompareBreakLocation);
646 for (const auto& v8_location : v8_locations) {
647 Location location = GetSourceLocation(v8_location.position());
648 locations->emplace_back(location.GetLineNumber(),
649 location.GetColumnNumber(), v8_location.type());
650 }
651 return true;
652}
653
654Maybe<int> Script::GetSourceOffset(const Location& location,
655 GetSourceOffsetMode mode) const {
656 i::Handle<i::Script> script = Utils::OpenHandle(this);
657#if V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
658 if (script->type() == i::Script::Type::kWasm) {
659 DCHECK_EQ(0, location.GetLineNumber());
660 return Just(location.GetColumnNumber());
661 }
662#endif // V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
663
664 int line = location.GetLineNumber();
665 int column = location.GetColumnNumber();
666 if (!script->HasSourceURLComment()) {
667 // Line/column number for inline <script>s with sourceURL annotation
668 // are supposed to be related to the <script> tag, otherwise they
669 // are relative to the parent file. Keep this in sync with the logic
670 // in GetSourceLocation() below.
671 line -= script->line_offset();
672 if (line == 0) column -= script->column_offset();
673 }
674
675 i::Script::InitLineEnds(script->GetIsolate(), script);
676 i::Handle<i::FixedArray> line_ends = i::Handle<i::FixedArray>::cast(
677 i::handle(script->line_ends(), script->GetIsolate()));
678 if (line < 0) {
679 if (mode == GetSourceOffsetMode::kClamp) {
680 return Just(0);
681 }
682 return Nothing<int>();
683 }
684 if (line >= line_ends->length()) {
685 if (mode == GetSourceOffsetMode::kClamp) {
686 return Just(GetSmiValue(line_ends, line_ends->length() - 1));
687 }
688 return Nothing<int>();
689 }
690 if (column < 0) {
691 if (mode != GetSourceOffsetMode::kClamp) {
692 return Nothing<int>();
693 }
694 column = 0;
695 }
696 int offset = column;
697 if (line > 0) {
698 int prev_line_end_offset = GetSmiValue(line_ends, line - 1);
699 offset += prev_line_end_offset + 1;
700 }
701 int line_end_offset = GetSmiValue(line_ends, line);
702 if (offset > line_end_offset) {
703 // Be permissive with columns that don't exist,
704 // as long as they are clearly within the range
705 // of the script.
706 if (line < line_ends->length() - 1 || mode == GetSourceOffsetMode::kClamp) {
707 return Just(line_end_offset);
708 }
709 return Nothing<int>();
710 }
711 return Just(offset);
712}
713
714Location Script::GetSourceLocation(int offset) const {
715 i::Handle<i::Script> script = Utils::OpenHandle(this);
716 i::Script::PositionInfo info;
717 i::Script::GetPositionInfo(script, offset, &info);
718 if (script->HasSourceURLComment()) {
719 // Line/column number for inline <script>s with sourceURL annotation
720 // are supposed to be related to the <script> tag, otherwise they
721 // are relative to the parent file. Keep this in sync with the logic
722 // in GetSourceOffset() above.
723 info.line -= script->line_offset();
724 if (info.line == 0) info.column -= script->column_offset();
725 }
726 return Location(info.line, info.column);
727}
728
729bool Script::SetScriptSource(Local<String> newSource, bool preview,
730 bool allow_top_frame_live_editing,
731 LiveEditResult* result) const {
732 i::Handle<i::Script> script = Utils::OpenHandle(this);
733 i::Isolate* isolate = script->GetIsolate();
734 return isolate->debug()->SetScriptSource(
735 script, Utils::OpenHandle(*newSource), preview,
736 allow_top_frame_live_editing, result);
737}
738
739bool Script::SetBreakpoint(Local<String> condition, Location* location,
740 BreakpointId* id) const {
741 i::Handle<i::Script> script = Utils::OpenHandle(this);
742 i::Isolate* isolate = script->GetIsolate();
743 int offset;
744 if (!GetSourceOffset(*location).To(&offset)) {
745 return false;
746 }
747 if (!isolate->debug()->SetBreakPointForScript(
748 script, Utils::OpenHandle(*condition), &offset, id)) {
749 return false;
750 }
751 *location = GetSourceLocation(offset);
752 return true;
753}
754
755bool Script::SetInstrumentationBreakpoint(BreakpointId* id) const {
756 i::Handle<i::Script> script = Utils::OpenHandle(this);
757 i::Isolate* isolate = script->GetIsolate();
758#if V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
759 if (script->type() == i::Script::Type::kWasm) {
760 isolate->debug()->SetInstrumentationBreakpointForWasmScript(script, id);
761 return true;
762 }
763#endif // V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
764 i::SharedFunctionInfo::ScriptIterator it(isolate, *script);
765 for (i::Tagged<i::SharedFunctionInfo> sfi = it.Next(); !sfi.is_null();
766 sfi = it.Next()) {
767 if (sfi->is_toplevel()) {
768 return isolate->debug()->SetBreakpointForFunction(
769 handle(sfi, isolate), isolate->factory()->empty_string(), id,
770 internal::Debug::kInstrumentation);
771 }
772 }
773 return false;
774}
775
776#if V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
777void Script::RemoveWasmBreakpoint(BreakpointId id) {
778 i::Handle<i::Script> script = Utils::OpenHandle(this);
779 i::Isolate* isolate = script->GetIsolate();
780 isolate->debug()->RemoveBreakpointForWasmScript(script, id);
781}
782#endif // V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
783
784void RemoveBreakpoint(Isolate* v8_isolate, BreakpointId id) {
785 i::Isolate* isolate = reinterpret_cast<i::Isolate*>(v8_isolate);
786 i::HandleScope handle_scope(isolate);
787 isolate->debug()->RemoveBreakpoint(id);
788}

790Platform* GetCurrentPlatform() { return i::V8::GetCurrentPlatform(); }
791
792void ForceGarbageCollection(Isolate* isolate, StackState embedder_stack_state) {
793 i::EmbedderStackStateScope stack_scope(
794 reinterpret_cast<i::Isolate*>(isolate)->heap(),
795 i::EmbedderStackStateOrigin::kImplicitThroughTask, embedder_stack_state);
796 isolate->LowMemoryNotification();
797}

799#if V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
800WasmScript* WasmScript::Cast(Script* script) {
801 CHECK(script->IsWasm());
802 return static_cast<WasmScript*>(script);
803}
804
805WasmScript::DebugSymbolsType WasmScript::GetDebugSymbolType() const {
806 auto script = Utils::OpenDirectHandle(this);
807 DCHECK_EQ(i::Script::Type::kWasm, script->type());
808 switch (script->wasm_native_module()->module()->debug_symbols.type) {
809 case i::wasm::WasmDebugSymbols::Type::None:
810 return WasmScript::DebugSymbolsType::None;
811 case i::wasm::WasmDebugSymbols::Type::EmbeddedDWARF:
812 return WasmScript::DebugSymbolsType::EmbeddedDWARF;
813 case i::wasm::WasmDebugSymbols::Type::ExternalDWARF:
814 return WasmScript::DebugSymbolsType::ExternalDWARF;
815 case i::wasm::WasmDebugSymbols::Type::SourceMap:
816 return WasmScript::DebugSymbolsType::SourceMap;
817 }
818}
819
820MemorySpan<const char> WasmScript::ExternalSymbolsURL() const {
821 auto script = Utils::OpenDirectHandle(this);
822 DCHECK_EQ(i::Script::Type::kWasm, script->type());
823
824 const i::wasm::WasmDebugSymbols& symbols =
825 script->wasm_native_module()->module()->debug_symbols;
826 if (symbols.external_url.is_empty()) return {};
827
828 internal::wasm::ModuleWireBytes wire_bytes(
829 script->wasm_native_module()->wire_bytes());
830 i::wasm::WasmName external_url =
831 wire_bytes.GetNameOrNull(symbols.external_url);
832 return {external_url.data(), external_url.size()};
833}
834
835int WasmScript::NumFunctions() const {
836 i::DisallowGarbageCollection no_gc;
837 auto script = Utils::OpenDirectHandle(this);
838 DCHECK_EQ(i::Script::Type::kWasm, script->type());
839 i::wasm::NativeModule* native_module = script->wasm_native_module();
840 const i::wasm::WasmModule* module = native_module->module();
841 DCHECK_GE(i::kMaxInt, module->functions.size());
842 return static_cast<int>(module->functions.size());
843}
844
845int WasmScript::NumImportedFunctions() const {
846 i::DisallowGarbageCollection no_gc;
847 auto script = Utils::OpenDirectHandle(this);
848 DCHECK_EQ(i::Script::Type::kWasm, script->type());
849 i::wasm::NativeModule* native_module = script->wasm_native_module();
850 const i::wasm::WasmModule* module = native_module->module();
851 DCHECK_GE(i::kMaxInt, module->num_imported_functions);
852 return static_cast<int>(module->num_imported_functions);
853}
854
855std::pair<int, int> WasmScript::GetFunctionRange(int function_index) const {
856 i::DisallowGarbageCollection no_gc;
857 auto script = Utils::OpenDirectHandle(this);
858 DCHECK_EQ(i::Script::Type::kWasm, script->type());
859 i::wasm::NativeModule* native_module = script->wasm_native_module();
860 const i::wasm::WasmModule* module = native_module->module();
861 DCHECK_LE(0, function_index);
862 DCHECK_GT(module->functions.size(), function_index);
863 const i::wasm::WasmFunction& func = module->functions[function_index];
864 DCHECK_GE(i::kMaxInt, func.code.offset());
865 DCHECK_GE(i::kMaxInt, func.code.end_offset());
866 return std::make_pair(static_cast<int>(func.code.offset()),
867 static_cast<int>(func.code.end_offset()));
868}
869
870int WasmScript::GetContainingFunction(int byte_offset) const {
871 i::DisallowGarbageCollection no_gc;
872 auto script = Utils::OpenDirectHandle(this);
873 DCHECK_EQ(i::Script::Type::kWasm, script->type());
874 i::wasm::NativeModule* native_module = script->wasm_native_module();
875 const i::wasm::WasmModule* module = native_module->module();
876 DCHECK_LE(0, byte_offset);
877
878 return i::wasm::GetContainingWasmFunction(module, byte_offset);
879}
880
881void WasmScript::Disassemble(DisassemblyCollector* collector,
882 std::vector<int>* function_body_offsets) {
883 i::DisallowGarbageCollection no_gc;
884 auto script = Utils::OpenDirectHandle(this);
885 DCHECK_EQ(i::Script::Type::kWasm, script->type());
886 i::wasm::NativeModule* native_module = script->wasm_native_module();
887 const i::wasm::WasmModule* module = native_module->module();
888 i::wasm::ModuleWireBytes wire_bytes(native_module->wire_bytes());
889 i::wasm::Disassemble(module, wire_bytes, native_module->GetNamesProvider(),
890 collector, function_body_offsets);
891}
892
893void Disassemble(base::Vector<const uint8_t> wire_bytes,
894 DisassemblyCollector* collector,
895 std::vector<int>* function_body_offsets) {
896 i::wasm::Disassemble(wire_bytes, collector, function_body_offsets);
897}
898
899uint32_t WasmScript::GetFunctionHash(int function_index) {
900 i::DisallowGarbageCollection no_gc;
901 auto script = Utils::OpenDirectHandle(this);
902 DCHECK_EQ(i::Script::Type::kWasm, script->type());
903 i::wasm::NativeModule* native_module = script->wasm_native_module();
904 const i::wasm::WasmModule* module = native_module->module();
905 DCHECK_LE(0, function_index);
906 DCHECK_GT(module->functions.size(), function_index);
907 const i::wasm::WasmFunction& func = module->functions[function_index];
908 i::wasm::ModuleWireBytes wire_bytes(native_module->wire_bytes());
909 base::Vector<const uint8_t> function_bytes =
910 wire_bytes.GetFunctionBytes(&func);
911 // TODO(herhut): Maybe also take module, name and signature into account.
912 return i::StringHasher::HashSequentialString(function_bytes.begin(),
913 function_bytes.length(), 0);
914}
915
916int WasmScript::CodeOffset() const {
917 auto script = Utils::OpenDirectHandle(this);
918 DCHECK_EQ(i::Script::Type::kWasm, script->type());
919 i::wasm::NativeModule* native_module = script->wasm_native_module();
920 const i::wasm::WasmModule* module = native_module->module();
921
922 // If the module contains at least one function, the code offset must have
923 // been initialized, and it cannot be zero.
924 DCHECK_IMPLIES(module->num_declared_functions > 0,
925 module->code.offset() != 0);
926 return module->code.offset();
927}
928#endif // V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
929
930Location::Location(int line_number, int column_number)
931 : line_number_(line_number),
932 column_number_(column_number),
933 is_empty_(false) {}
934
935Location::Location()
936 : line_number_(Function::kLineOffsetNotFound),
937 column_number_(Function::kLineOffsetNotFound),
938 is_empty_(true) {}
939
940int Location::GetLineNumber() const {
941 DCHECK(!IsEmpty());
942 return line_number_;
943}
944
945int Location::GetColumnNumber() const {
946 DCHECK(!IsEmpty());
947 return column_number_;
948}
949
950bool Location::IsEmpty() const { return is_empty_; }
951
952void GetLoadedScripts(Isolate* v8_isolate,
953 std::vector<v8::Global<Script>>& scripts) {
954 i::Isolate* isolate = reinterpret_cast<i::Isolate*>(v8_isolate);
955 ENTER_V8_NO_SCRIPT_NO_EXCEPTION(isolate);
956 {
957 i::DisallowGarbageCollection no_gc;
958 i::Script::Iterator iterator(isolate);
959 for (i::Tagged<i::Script> script = iterator.Next(); !script.is_null();
960 script = iterator.Next()) {
961#if V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
962 if (script->type() != i::Script::Type::kNormal &&
963 script->type() != i::Script::Type::kWasm) {
964 continue;
965 }
966#else
967 if (script->type() != i::Script::Type::kNormal) continue;
968#endif // V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
969 if (!script->HasValidSource()) continue;
970 i::HandleScope handle_scope(isolate);
971 i::Handle<i::Script> script_handle(script, isolate);
972 scripts.emplace_back(v8_isolate, ToApiHandle<Script>(script_handle));
973 }
974 }
975}
976
977MaybeLocal<UnboundScript> CompileInspectorScript(Isolate* v8_isolate,
978 Local<String> source) {
979 i::Isolate* isolate = reinterpret_cast<i::Isolate*>(v8_isolate);
980 v8::Local<v8::Context> context = Utils::ToLocal(isolate->native_context());
981 PREPARE_FOR_DEBUG_INTERFACE_EXECUTION_WITH_ISOLATE(isolate, context,
982 UnboundScript);
983 i::Handle<i::String> str = Utils::OpenHandle(*source);
984 i::Handle<i::SharedFunctionInfo> result;
985 {
986 i::AlignedCachedData* cached_data = nullptr;
987 ScriptCompiler::CompilationDetails compilation_details;
988 i::MaybeHandle<i::SharedFunctionInfo> maybe_function_info =
989 i::Compiler::GetSharedFunctionInfoForScriptWithCachedData(
990 isolate, str, i::ScriptDetails(), cached_data,
991 ScriptCompiler::kNoCompileOptions,
992 ScriptCompiler::kNoCacheBecauseInspector,
993 i::v8_flags.expose_inspector_scripts ? i::NOT_NATIVES_CODE
994 : i::INSPECTOR_CODE,
995 &compilation_details);
996 has_exception = !maybe_function_info.ToHandle(&result);
997 RETURN_ON_FAILED_EXECUTION(UnboundScript);
998 }
999 RETURN_ESCAPED(ToApiHandle<UnboundScript>(result));
1000}

1022
1023void ResetBlackboxedStateCache(Isolate* v8_isolate, Local<Script> script) {
1024 i::Isolate* isolate = reinterpret_cast<i::Isolate*>(v8_isolate);
1025 ENTER_V8_NO_SCRIPT_NO_EXCEPTION(isolate);
1026 i::DisallowGarbageCollection no_gc;
1027 i::SharedFunctionInfo::ScriptIterator iter(isolate,
1028 *Utils::OpenDirectHandle(*script));
1029 for (i::Tagged<i::SharedFunctionInfo> info = iter.Next(); !info.is_null();
1030 info = iter.Next()) {
1031 if (auto debug_info = isolate->debug()->TryGetDebugInfo(info)) {
1032 debug_info.value()->set_computed_debug_is_blackboxed(false);
1033 }
1034 }
1035}

1037int EstimatedValueSize(Isolate* v8_isolate, Local<Value> value) {
1038 i::Isolate* isolate = reinterpret_cast<i::Isolate*>(v8_isolate);
1039 ENTER_V8_NO_SCRIPT_NO_EXCEPTION(isolate);
1040 auto object = Utils::OpenDirectHandle(*value);
1041 if (IsSmi(*object)) return i::kTaggedSize;
1042 CHECK(IsHeapObject(*object));
1043 return i::DirectHandle<i::HeapObject>::cast(object)->Size();
1044}

1065Local<String> WasmValueObject::type() const {
1066 auto object =
1067 i::DirectHandle<i::WasmValueObject>::cast(Utils::OpenDirectHandle(this));
1068 i::Isolate* isolate = object->GetIsolate();

1073
1074Local<Function> GetBuiltin(Isolate* v8_isolate, Builtin requested_builtin) {
1075 i::Isolate* isolate = reinterpret_cast<i::Isolate*>(v8_isolate);
1076 ENTER_V8_NO_SCRIPT_NO_EXCEPTION(isolate);
1077 i::HandleScope handle_scope(isolate);
1078
1079 CHECK_EQ(requested_builtin, kStringToLowerCase);
1080 i::Builtin builtin = i::Builtin::kStringPrototypeToLocaleLowerCase;
1081
1082 i::Factory* factory = isolate->factory();
1083 i::Handle<i::String> name = isolate->factory()->empty_string();
1084 i::Handle<i::NativeContext> context(isolate->native_context());
1085 i::Handle<i::SharedFunctionInfo> info =
1086 factory->NewSharedFunctionInfoForBuiltin(name, builtin);
1087 info->set_language_mode(i::LanguageMode::kStrict);
1088 i::Handle<i::JSFunction> fun =
1089 i::Factory::JSFunctionBuilder{isolate, info, context}
1090 .set_map(isolate->strict_function_without_prototype_map())
1091 .Build();
1092
1093 fun->shared()->set_internal_formal_parameter_count(i::JSParameterCount(0));
1094 fun->shared()->set_length(0);
1095 return Utils::ToLocal(handle_scope.CloseAndEscape(fun));
1096}

1098void SetConsoleDelegate(Isolate* v8_isolate, ConsoleDelegate* delegate) {
1099 i::Isolate* isolate = reinterpret_cast<i::Isolate*>(v8_isolate);
1100 DCHECK_NO_SCRIPT_NO_EXCEPTION(isolate);
1101 if (delegate == nullptr) {
1102 isolate->set_console_delegate(nullptr);
1103 } else {
1104 isolate->set_console_delegate(delegate);
1105 }
1106}

1108ConsoleCallArguments::ConsoleCallArguments(

1110 : isolate_(info.GetIsolate()),

1116 : isolate_(reinterpret_cast<v8::Isolate*>(isolate)),
1117 values_(args.length() > 1 ? args.address_of_first_argument() : nullptr),
1118 length_(args.length() - 1) {}

1120v8::Local<v8::Message> CreateMessageFromException(
1121 Isolate* v8_isolate, v8::Local<v8::Value> v8_error) {
1122 i::Handle<i::Object> obj = Utils::OpenHandle(*v8_error);
1123 i::Isolate* isolate = reinterpret_cast<i::Isolate*>(v8_isolate);
1124 ENTER_V8_NO_SCRIPT_NO_EXCEPTION(isolate);
1125 i::HandleScope scope(isolate);
1126 return Utils::MessageToLocal(
1127 scope.CloseAndEscape(isolate->CreateMessageFromException(obj)));
1128}
1129
1130MaybeLocal<Script> GeneratorObject::Script() {
1131 auto obj = Utils::OpenDirectHandle(this);
1132 i::Tagged<i::Object> maybe_script = obj->function()->shared()->script();
1133 if (!IsScript(maybe_script)) return {};
1134 i::Isolate* isolate = obj->GetIsolate();
1135 i::DirectHandle<i::Script> script(i::Script::cast(maybe_script), isolate);
1136 return ToApiHandle<v8::debug::Script>(script, isolate);
1137}
1138
1139Local<Function> GeneratorObject::Function() {
1140 auto obj = Utils::OpenDirectHandle(this);
1141 return Utils::ToLocal(handle(obj->function(), obj->GetIsolate()));
1142}
1143
1144Location GeneratorObject::SuspendedLocation() {
1145 auto obj = Utils::OpenDirectHandle(this);
1146 CHECK(obj->is_suspended());
1147 i::Tagged<i::Object> maybe_script = obj->function()->shared()->script();
1148 if (!IsScript(maybe_script)) return Location();
1149 i::Isolate* isolate = obj->GetIsolate();
1150 i::Handle<i::Script> script(i::Script::cast(maybe_script), isolate);
1151 i::Script::PositionInfo info;
1152 i::SharedFunctionInfo::EnsureSourcePositionsAvailable(
1153 isolate, i::handle(obj->function()->shared(), isolate));
1154 i::Script::GetPositionInfo(script, obj->source_position(), &info);
1155 return Location(info.line, info.column);
1156}
1157
1158bool GeneratorObject::IsSuspended() {
1159 return Utils::OpenDirectHandle(this)->is_suspended();
1160}
1161
1162v8::Local<GeneratorObject> GeneratorObject::Cast(v8::Local<v8::Value> value) {
1163 CHECK(value->IsGeneratorObject());
1164 return ToApiHandle<GeneratorObject>(Utils::OpenHandle(*value));
1165}
1166
1167MaybeLocal<Value> CallFunctionOn(Local<Context> context,
1168 Local<Function> function, Local<Value> recv,
1169 int argc, Global<Value> argv[],
1170 bool throw_on_side_effect) {
1171 auto isolate = reinterpret_cast<i::Isolate*>(context->GetIsolate());
1172 PREPARE_FOR_DEBUG_INTERFACE_EXECUTION_WITH_ISOLATE(isolate, context, Value);
1173 auto self = Utils::OpenHandle(*function);
1174 auto recv_obj = Utils::OpenHandle(*recv);
1175 static_assert(sizeof(v8::Global<v8::Value>) == sizeof(i::Handle<i::Object>));
1176 auto args = reinterpret_cast<i::Handle<i::Object>*>(argv);
1177 // Disable breaks in side-effect free mode.
1178 i::DisableBreak disable_break_scope(isolate->debug(), throw_on_side_effect);
1179 if (throw_on_side_effect) {
1180 isolate->debug()->StartSideEffectCheckMode();
1181 }
1182 Local<Value> result;
1183 has_exception = !ToLocal<Value>(
1184 i::Execution::Call(isolate, self, recv_obj, argc, args), &result);
1185 if (throw_on_side_effect) {
1186 isolate->debug()->StopSideEffectCheckMode();
1187 }
1188 RETURN_ON_FAILED_EXECUTION(Value);
1189 RETURN_ESCAPED(result);
1190}
1191
1192MaybeLocal<v8::Value> EvaluateGlobal(v8::Isolate* isolate,
1193 v8::Local<v8::String> source,
1194 EvaluateGlobalMode mode, bool repl) {
1195 i::Isolate* i_isolate = reinterpret_cast<i::Isolate*>(isolate);
1196 v8::Local<v8::Context> context = Utils::ToLocal(i_isolate->native_context());
1197 PREPARE_FOR_DEBUG_INTERFACE_EXECUTION_WITH_ISOLATE(i_isolate, context, Value);
1198 i::REPLMode repl_mode = repl ? i::REPLMode::kYes : i::REPLMode::kNo;
1199 Local<Value> result;
1200 has_exception = !ToLocal<Value>(
1201 i::DebugEvaluate::Global(i_isolate, Utils::OpenHandle(*source), mode,
1202 repl_mode),
1203 &result);
1204 RETURN_ON_FAILED_EXECUTION(Value);
1205 RETURN_ESCAPED(result);
1206}
1207
1208void GlobalLexicalScopeNames(v8::Local<v8::Context> v8_context,
1209 std::vector<v8::Global<v8::String>>* names) {
1210 auto context = Utils::OpenDirectHandle(*v8_context);
1211 i::Isolate* isolate = context->GetIsolate();
1212 i::DirectHandle<i::ScriptContextTable> table(
1213 context->native_context()->script_context_table(), isolate);
1214 for (int i = 0; i < table->length(kAcquireLoad); i++) {
1215 i::DirectHandle<i::Context> script_context(table->get(i), isolate);
1216 DCHECK(script_context->IsScriptContext());
1217 i::Handle<i::ScopeInfo> scope_info(script_context->scope_info(), isolate);
1218 for (auto it : i::ScopeInfo::IterateLocalNames(scope_info)) {
1219 if (i::ScopeInfo::VariableIsSynthetic(it->name())) continue;
1220 names->emplace_back(reinterpret_cast<Isolate*>(isolate),
1221 Utils::ToLocal(handle(it->name(), isolate)));
1222 }
1223 }
1224}

1226void SetReturnValue(v8::Isolate* v8_isolate, v8::Local<v8::Value> value) {

1228 isolate->debug()->set_return_value(*Utils::OpenDirectHandle(*value));
1229}

1233 ->random_number_generator()
1234 ->NextInt64();

1236
1237int GetDebuggingId(v8::Local<v8::Function> function) {
1238 i::Handle<i::JSReceiver> callable = v8::Utils::OpenHandle(*function);
1239 if (!IsJSFunction(*callable)) return i::DebugInfo::kNoDebuggingId;
1240 i::Handle<i::JSFunction> func = i::Handle<i::JSFunction>::cast(callable);
1241 int id = func->GetIsolate()->debug()->GetFunctionDebuggingId(func);
1242 DCHECK_NE(i::DebugInfo::kNoDebuggingId, id);
1243 return id;
1244}
1245
1246bool SetFunctionBreakpoint(v8::Local<v8::Function> function,
1247 v8::Local<v8::String> condition, BreakpointId* id) {
1248 auto callable = Utils::OpenDirectHandle(*function);
1249 if (!IsJSFunction(*callable)) return false;
1250 auto jsfunction = i::DirectHandle<i::JSFunction>::cast(callable);
1251 i::Isolate* isolate = jsfunction->GetIsolate();
1252 i::Handle<i::String> condition_string =
1253 condition.IsEmpty() ? isolate->factory()->empty_string()
1254 : Utils::OpenHandle(*condition);
1255 return isolate->debug()->SetBreakpointForFunction(
1256 handle(jsfunction->shared(), isolate), condition_string, id);
1257}

1335
1336MaybeLocal<v8::Value> EphemeronTable::Get(v8::Isolate* isolate,
1337 v8::Local<v8::Value> key) {
1338 i::Isolate* i_isolate = reinterpret_cast<i::Isolate*>(isolate);
1339 auto self = i::DirectHandle<i::EphemeronHashTable>::cast(
1340 Utils::OpenDirectHandle(this));
1341 i::Handle<i::Object> internal_key = Utils::OpenHandle(*key);
1342 DCHECK(IsJSReceiver(*internal_key));
1343
1344 i::DirectHandle<i::Object> value(self->Lookup(internal_key), i_isolate);
1345
1346 if (IsTheHole(*value)) return {};
1347 return Utils::ToLocal(value, i_isolate);
1348}
1349
1350Local<EphemeronTable> EphemeronTable::Set(v8::Isolate* isolate,
1351 v8::Local<v8::Value> key,
1352 v8::Local<v8::Value> value) {
1353 auto self = i::Handle<i::EphemeronHashTable>::cast(Utils::OpenHandle(this));
1354 i::Handle<i::Object> internal_key = Utils::OpenHandle(*key);
1355 i::Handle<i::Object> internal_value = Utils::OpenHandle(*value);
1356 DCHECK(IsJSReceiver(*internal_key));
1357
1358 i::Handle<i::EphemeronHashTable> result(
1359 i::EphemeronHashTable::Put(self, internal_key, internal_value));
1360
1361 return ToApiHandle<EphemeronTable>(result);
1362}
1363
1364Local<EphemeronTable> EphemeronTable::New(v8::Isolate* isolate) {
1365 i::Isolate* i_isolate = reinterpret_cast<i::Isolate*>(isolate);
1366 ENTER_V8_NO_SCRIPT_NO_EXCEPTION(i_isolate);
1367 i::Handle<i::EphemeronHashTable> table =
1368 i::EphemeronHashTable::New(i_isolate, 0);
1369 return ToApiHandle<EphemeronTable>(table);
1370}
1371
1372EphemeronTable* EphemeronTable::Cast(v8::Value* value) {
1373 return static_cast<EphemeronTable*>(value);
1374}

1393
1394MaybeLocal<Message> GetMessageFromPromise(Local<Promise> p) {
1395 i::Handle<i::JSPromise> promise = Utils::OpenHandle(*p);
1396 i::Isolate* isolate = promise->GetIsolate();
1397
1398 i::Handle<i::Symbol> key = isolate->factory()->promise_debug_message_symbol();
1399 i::Handle<i::Object> maybeMessage =
1400 i::JSReceiver::GetDataProperty(isolate, promise, key);
1401
1402 if (!IsJSMessageObject(*maybeMessage, isolate)) return MaybeLocal<Message>();
1403 return ToApiHandle<Message>(
1404 i::Handle<i::JSMessageObject>::cast(maybeMessage));
1405}

1416
1417std::unique_ptr<PropertyIterator> PropertyIterator::Create(
1418 Local<Context> context, Local<Object> object, bool skip_indices) {
1419 internal::Isolate* isolate =
1420 reinterpret_cast<i::Isolate*>(context->GetIsolate());
1421 if (isolate->is_execution_terminating()) {
1422 return nullptr;
1423 }
1424 CallDepthScope<false> call_depth_scope(isolate, context);
1425
1426 return i::DebugPropertyIterator::Create(isolate, Utils::OpenHandle(*object),
1427 skip_indices);
1428}
1429
1430} // namespace debug
1431
1432namespace internal {
1433
1434Maybe<bool> DebugPropertyIterator::Advance() {
1435 if (isolate_->is_execution_terminating()) {
1436 return Nothing<bool>();
1437 }
1438 Local<v8::Context> context =
1439 Utils::ToLocal(handle(isolate_->context()->native_context(), isolate_));
1440 CallDepthScope<false> call_depth_scope(isolate_, context);
1441
1442 if (!AdvanceInternal()) {
1443 DCHECK(isolate_->has_exception());
1444 return Nothing<bool>();
1445 }
1446 return Just(true);
1447}
